item.title: 条款书显示，中国地平线机器人公司通过香港增发配股融资约 8.21 亿美元
item.description: 据路透社周五看到的一份条款书显示，中国自动驾驶解决方案供应商地平线机器人公司（Horizon Robotics）通过香港增发配售筹集了约 8.21 亿美元。【原文：Chinese autonomous driving solutions provider Horizon Robotics has raised about $821 million through a Hong Kong top-up placement, according to a term sheet seen by Reuters on Friday.】

item.title: 特朗普称美国将从 10 月 1 日起对重型卡车进口征收 25% 的关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周四表示，美国将从 10 月 1 日起对所有重型卡车的进口征收 25% 的关税。【原文：President Donald Trump said on Thursday that the United States will impose a 25% tariff on imports of all heavy trucks from October 1.】

item.title: 华尔街最高监管机构称将审查白宫呼吁的裁员计划
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission）负责人周四表示，他尚未对白宫要求联邦机构在政府可能关门期间进行大规模裁员的呼吁进行审查，但他相信该机构正在努力满足唐纳德-特朗普总统的优先要求。【原文：The head of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission said on Thursday he had yet to review a call from the White House for mass layoffs at federal agencies during a possible government shutdown but believed the agency was working to meet President Donald Trump's priorities.】

item.title: 据 Information 报道，Meta 公司正在洽谈使用谷歌的双子座来改进广告定位功能
item.description: 据 Information 周四报道，Meta 的员工已经与 Alphabet 旗下的谷歌云公司（Google Cloud）就使用其双子座模型改善 Facebook 母公司广告业务的可能性进行了讨论。【原文：Meta staffers have had discussions with Alphabet's Google Cloud about the possibility of using its Gemini models to improve the Facebook parent's ad business, the Information reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 花旗银行出售 Banamex 股份后将寻求更多少数股权投资者
item.description: 花旗集团高管周四表示，在启动潜在的首次公开募股之前，花旗集团将为其墨西哥零售部门 Banamex 寻找更多的少数投资者。【原文：Citigroup will look for more minority investors in its Mexican retail unit, Banamex, before launching a potential initial public offering, executives said on Thursday.】

item.title: 派拉蒙天舞任命前反垄断执法者德尔拉希姆为法律总监
item.description: 派拉蒙天舞公司（Paramount Skydance）周四任命前美国反垄断高级官员马坎-德尔拉希姆（Makan Delrahim）为首席法务官，为竞购华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros Discovery）做准备。【原文：Paramount Skydance on Thursday named Makan Delrahim, a former senior U.S. antitrust official, as its chief legal officer, amid preparations for a bid for Warner Bros Discovery .】

item.title: 大银行在纽约赢得驳回利差操纵诉讼的判决
item.description: 周四，一名联邦法官驳回了一系列反垄断诉讼中的 "所有剩余诉讼请求"，这些诉讼指控大型银行合谋操纵 Libor，而 Libor 是一种利率基准，曾支撑了数以万亿美元计的交易，损害了投资者的利益。【原文：A federal judge on Thursday dismissed "all remaining claims" in a slew of antitrust litigation accusing large banks of conspiring to rig Libor, an interest rate benchmark that once underpinned hundreds of trillions of dollars of transactions, at investors' expense.】

item.title: 美国敲响黑客攻击思科安全设备的警钟
item.description: 美国政府网络防御机构就黑客利用思科安全设备中一个此前未知的漏洞一事向其他联邦机构发布了紧急指导。【原文：The U.S. government's cyber defense agency has issued urgent guidance to other federal agencies over hackers exploiting a previously unknown vulnerability in Cisco security devices.】

item.title: 美国法官初步批准 Anthropic 与作者达成的 15 亿美元版权和解协议
item.description: 据作者代表发布的一份新闻稿称，加利福尼亚州的一名联邦法官周四初步批准了一项具有里程碑意义的版权集体诉讼和解协议，该诉讼是由一群作者针对人工智能公司 Anthropic 在其人工智能训练中使用了他们的作品而提起的。【原文：A federal judge in California on Thursday preliminarily approved a landmark settlement of a copyright class action brought by a group of authors against artificial intelligence company Anthropic over the use of their work in its AI training, according to a press release from the authors' representatives.】

item.title: 交易日：小声说......但这是顶部吗？
item.description: 了解推动全球市场的各种力量。【原文：Making sense of the forces driving global markets.】

item.title: 报告称，尽管美国对中国船只征收港口费，但中国造船厂订单依然强劲
item.description: 美国战略与国际研究中心（Center for Strategic and International Studies）的一份最新报告显示，尽管美国针对这些船只征收港口费，旨在对抗中国的海上霸主地位，但全球航运公司仍在全力以赴地从中国造船厂订购商船。【原文：Global shipping companies are moving full steam ahead with commercial vessel orders from Chinese shipyards, despite the U.S. targeting those ships with port fees aimed at countering China's maritime dominance, a new report from the Center for Strategic and International Studies showed.】

item.title: 独家报道：瑞典鱼制造商梦得丽将把食品染料改成天然而非合成染料
item.description: 生产色彩鲜艳的 Sour Patch Kids 和 Swedish Fish 糖果的食品制造商 Mondelez 公司在一封电子邮件中说，该公司正在积极努力为使用合成色素的产品改用天然染料，但没有给出过渡的时间框架。【原文：Food maker Mondelez, which manufactures brightly colored Sour Patch Kids and Swedish Fish candies, is actively working to switch to natural dyes for products that use synthetic colors, the company said in an email, without giving a time frame for the transition.】

item.title: 特朗普签署命令，宣布 TikTok 出售计划符合美国要求
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周四签署了一项行政命令，宣布他将 TikTok 的美国业务出售给美国和全球投资者的计划将符合 2024 年法律的要求，该法律规定，除非中国所有者出售 TikTok，否则该短视频应用程序将被禁止使用。【原文：President Donald Trump signed an executive order on Thursday declaring that his plan to sell TikTok's U.S. operations to U.S. and global investors will meet the requirements in a 2024 law that says the short video app will be banned unless its Chinese owners sell it.】

item.title: 特朗普改变对卢拉的看法可能要归功于巴西牛肉大亨
item.description: 三位知情人士告诉路透社记者，巴西肉类包装巨头 JBS 的一位共同所有人在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周二在联合国演讲中出人意料地向巴西总统伸出橄榄枝约三周前私下会见了特朗普。【原文：A co-owner of Brazilian meatpacking giant JBS met privately with U.S. President Donald Trump about three weeks before Trump extended a surprise olive branch to Brazil's president in his United Nations speech on Tuesday, three people with knowledge of the encounter told Reuters.】

item.title: 由于对廉价生活必需品的需求强劲，好市多季度收入超出预期
item.description: 好市多批发公司（Costco Wholesale）周四公布的第四季度营收超出预期，原因是追求低价的美国人涌向这家会员制零售连锁店，抢购价格较低的生活必需品。【原文：Costco Wholesale beat fourth-quarter revenue estimates on Thursday, as Americans hunting for bargains flocked to the membership-only retail chain to snap up lower-priced essentials.】

item.title: 亚马逊 AWS 首席执行官斥责员工产品推出缓慢
item.description: 据路透社查阅的一份会议记录显示，亚马逊网络服务公司（Amazon Web Services）高层周四对员工进行了告诫，称他们在 12 月举行的首届 "重塑"（Reinvent）客户活动中，云计算服务提供商推出产品的速度太慢。【原文：Amazon Web Services' top executive admonished staff on Thursday for what he called slow product rollouts by the cloud computing provider at its premier Reinvent customer event in December, according to a transcript of a meeting reviewed by Reuters.】

item.title: Meta 推出新的人工智能视频节目 Vibes
item.description: 社交媒体巨头 Meta Platforms 推出了名为 Vibes 的新人工智能视频源，以加快人工智能技术的发展。【原文：Meta Platforms launched a new feed of AI videos, called Vibes, as the social media giant looks to fast-track work on artificial intelligence technology.】

item.title: 美联储戴利："随着时间的推移 "可能需要 "更多一点点 "的降息
item.description: 旧金山联邦储备银行行长玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）周四重申，美国央行可能需要进一步降息，但在平衡充分就业和物价稳定这两大目标的风险时，需要缓慢行动。【原文：San Francisco Federal Reserve Bank President Mary Daly repeated on Thursday that the U.S. central bank likely needs to cut interest rates further, but it needs to move slowly as it balances risks to its twin goals of full employment and price stability.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，英特尔与台积电洽谈投资或合作事宜
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周四援引知情人士的话报道，芯片制造商英特尔已就投资制造或合作事宜与台湾半导体制造公司进行了接触。【原文：Chipmaker Intel has approached Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company about investments in manufacturing or partnerships, the Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美联储主席库克敦促美国最高法院驳回特朗普解雇她的要求
item.description: 美联储理事丽莎-库克（Lisa Cook）周四敦促美国最高法院驳回唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）解雇她的企图，并告诉大法官们共和党总统这一史无前例的举动将破坏中央银行的独立性并扰乱金融市场。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook urged the U.S. Supreme Court on Thursday to reject Donald Trump's attempt to fire her, telling the justices the Republican president's unprecedented move would destroy the central bank's independence and disrupt financial markets.】

item.title: 五角大楼称美国批准向德国出售价值 12.3 亿美元的导弹
item.description: 五角大楼在周四的一份声明中说，美国国务院已批准可能向德国出售 AIM-120D-3 先进中程空对空导弹，售价约为 12.3 亿美元。【原文：The U.S. State Department has approved the potential sale of AIM-120D-3 advanced medium range air-to-air missiles to Germany for an estimated $1.23 billion, the Pentagon said in a statement on Thursday.】

item.title: 思科推出旨在连接量子计算云的软件
item.description: 思科公司周四发布了一款新的软件工具，旨在将不同制造商的量子计算机整合到一个单一的云中，从而更容易开发有用的应用。【原文：Cisco on Thursday announced a new software tool aimed at weaving together quantum computers from various makers into a single cloud, making it easier to develop useful applications.】

item.title: 高盛总裁称行业整合推动并购增长
item.description: 高盛总裁约翰-沃尔德伦（John Waldron）周四表示，受各行业整合以及私募股权支持交易可能加速的推动，高盛对并购的前景变得更加乐观。【原文：Goldman Sachs' outlook for mergers and acquisitions has become more optimistic, fueled by consolidation in various industry sectors and likely acceleration in private equity-backed deals, its President John Waldron said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美联储主席米兰力挺快速降息，但其他政策制定者表示反对
item.description: 美联储最新政策制定者斯蒂芬-米兰（Stephen Miran）周四继续敦促美国大幅降息，以防止劳动力市场崩溃。【原文：The Federal Reserve's newest policymaker, Stephen Miran, continued on Thursday to press for sharp U.S. interest-rate cuts to prevent labor market collapse, saying his fellow central bankers are more scared than they should be that tariffs will drive inflation up.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局将限制纽瓦克机场航班的命令延长至 2026 年 10 月
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局周四表示，将把限制纽瓦克自由国际机场运营的命令延长至 2026 年 10 月 24 日。【原文：The Federal Aviation Administration on Thursday said it was extending an order limiting operations at Newark Liberty International Airport through October 24, 2026.】

item.title: Citadel 首席执行官格里芬在接受 CNBC 采访时表示，预计美联储今年还会降息一次
item.description: Citadel 首席执行官肯-格里芬（Ken Griffin）周四在接受 CNBC 采访时表示，他预计美国联邦储备委员会今年还会降息一次。【原文：Citadel CEO Ken Griffin expects the U.S. Federal Reserve to cut interest rates one more time this year, he said on Thursday in a CNBC interview.】

item.title: 研究小组称，美国资金短缺将导致空中交通管制员培训中断
item.description: 一个行业组织周四表示，美国政府下周的部分停摆将导致空中交通管制员的招聘和培训停摆，并使美国旅游业每周损失 10 亿美元。【原文：A partial U.S. government shutdown next week would halt air traffic controller hiring and training and cost the U.S. travel sector $1 billion per week, an industry group said on Thursday.】

item.title: 据 CNBC 报道，甲骨文、银湖、MGX 将成为 TikTok 美国公司的主要投资者，持股比例为 45
item.description: 据 CNBC 周四援引消息人士的话报道，甲骨文、私募股权公司银湖和 MGX 将成为 TikTok 美国公司的主要投资者，合计持股 45%。【原文：Oracle , private equity firm Silver Lake and MGX are set to be the main investors in TikTok U.S. with a combined 45% ownership, CNBC reported on Thursday, citing sources.】

item.title: 中国东风目标明年欧洲汽车销量跃升至 80,000 辆
item.description: 中国汽车制造商东风汽车公司（Dongfeng Motor）周四表示，该公司的目标是通过混合使用内燃机、混合动力、增程器和全电动汽车，使明年在欧洲的销量增加两倍，达到 80,000 辆。【原文：Chinese automaker Dongfeng Motor said on Thursday it aims to triple sales in Europe to 80,000 units next year through a mix of internal combustion engine, hybrid, range extender and fully-electric vehicles.】

item.title: 美联储主席洛根呼吁全面改革央行利率控制工具包
item.description: 达拉斯联邦储备银行行长洛里-洛根（Lorie Logan）周四表示，中央银行为实现货币政策目标而对货币市场状况进行现代化管理的时机已经到来。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Dallas President Lorie Logan said Thursday the time has come for the central bank to modernize how it manages money market conditions to achieve its monetary policy objectives.】
